Comments_List: I improved my Arabic by a lot, although not as much as I would need. However, this class was less stressful and that's more important than the pace of the language class. Without proper health, it may lead to hating a language which will encourage student quit learning the language, so I truly appreciate our Instructor's help in that regard and willingness to work on Arabic outside of class as needed.

Yes definitely. If a student wants to take time in learning language while running tons of other activities, this class is definitely a buffer zone to be able to relax while learning and improving Arabic.
